attributes.action: understand that alcohol kills thousands of people every year where as marijuana hasnt ever been proved to kill anyone?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Marijuana has a fact that it had never caused a death in the whole time it has been used. Why when alcohol is proved to have killed thousands of people a year is legal and marijuana has never been, plus it has never been proved to actually cause any mental problems more than alcohol.
